author: cnbc.com
title: NACCO Industries, Inc. Announces Dates Of 2017 Fourth Quarter And Full Year Earnings Release And Conference Call
text:
CLEVELAND, NACCO Industries, Inc. (NYSE:NC) will release 2017 Fourth Quarter and Full Year financial results and will file its 2017 Annual Report on Form 10-K after the close of the market on Wednesday, March 7, 2018.
The Company will also host a conference call on Thursday, March 8, 2018 to discuss its results for the 2017 fourth quarter and full year.
Conference Call: Thursday, March 8, 2018
Time: 8:00 a.m. (Eastern Time)
Telephone: (844) 855-9691 (Toll Free) or (647) 689-2407 (International)
Conference ID: 6291859
(Call in at least five minutes before start time)
For Replay Call: (800) 585-8367 (Toll Free) or (416) 621-4642 (International)
Conference ID: 6291859
This call will also be broadcast live and available for replay over the Internet. To access the call, go to www.nacco.com . Please allow 15 minutes to register, download and install any necessary software.
NACCO Industries, Inc. is an operating holding company for the North American Coal Corporation, which mines coal primarily for use in power generation and provides value-added services for natural resource companies. For more information about NACCO, visit the Company's website at www.nacco.com .
